resources.string: Coz everyone follow their first love of life.

This is a Planer Graph puzzle.
 You have to move the vertices such that no edges of the graph intersect. 

 Gameplay 
In this Game, Your goal is to remove the cuts by moving the blue dots one by one. 

 Enjoy!!!!

Notes 
*Choose from 4 beautiful themes in settings. 
*Slide to access different chapters. 
*There is a special section for Generating real time graph puzzles in Chapter Four.
